Blancett Turbine Flow Meters are Open Distribution - You Can Sell Them, Too!
That's right! Blancett is an open distribution product line from Badger Meter. This means you don't have to be specifically contracted or authorized to sell Blancett turbine flow meters.
Blancett turbine flow meters measure everything from water in hydraulic fracturing and mining operations, to gases and liquids from wellheads, and various fluids in sanitary environments. A wide variety of operations worldwide depend on Blancett turbine meters to deliver accurate, consistent, reliable, and informative flow measurements for both liquid and gas applications.
